_sText:
**gg_simpletextures**
==================
This map is almost fully build out of custom textures made by myself. It has a big fan in the middle that you use to get to the other side fast (fall danger). It took me quite a while to create and this is my first gungame map. If you found any bug or have suggestions please put them in a comment. Also don't forget to rate !

But most of all,

**HAVE FUN !**
**Features**
==================
- Custom Textures
- Rotating Fan
- Rope Bridge
- HDR
- Soundscape
- Overview (Minimap) 
- Custom Skybox 
- **OPTIMISATION** 

Installation
==================
To install this map just copy the .bsp file inside the map to: \Steam\steamapps\STEAM USER ID\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\
